英超車路士尋晚喺倫敦打吡不敵阿仙奴，賽後，因為傳波準但冇腳關鍵嘅車路士中場佐真奴費路，又一次成為各界炮轟對象，話佢踢唔掂英超，甚至插佢只係主帥沙利契仔。事實上，睇番今場佐真奴費路數據，全場傳球81次，成功率85%，但關鍵傳球一欄，對唔係，係0次呀！

或者再睇埋著名數據網站whoscored資料，呢位意大利國腳今季喺英超出場22次，傳球次數去到2,078次，但開季到依家嘅關鍵傳球都只係得可憐嘅14次咁大把，要知道「車仔」舊年夏天係用咗高達5,700萬鎊簽佢返嚟，而至今都係1入球0助攻，係咪物有所值，真係你諗你喇！

依家成日去講波嘅曼聯名將里奧費迪南就寸爆佢廢，話佢跑動少，幫唔到防守，進攻又係差，簡直係中場隱患咁話。至於啲網友更加唔客氣，有人插佢：「佢喺意大利被高估咗，嚟到英超露晒底啦！」把口再衰啲嘅話：「畀個假髮佐真奴費路，佢完全可以過檔去踢車路士女子隊呀，呢條友喺球場根本完全冇作用。」真係聽到都心酸呀！

意大利公營電視廣播（RAI）體育台消息：車路士主帥沙利擬以皇馬中場伊斯高（Francisco Isco）取代可能在季尾轉投皇馬的夏薩特（Eden Hazard）。


RAI 報導指伊斯高與皇馬之間的關係正深陷低谷，有意告別班拿貝球場。皇馬新帥蘇拿利在上任後把伊斯高貶入後備席，據說是得到皇馬主席佩雷斯首肯。

祖雲達斯對伊斯高一直感到興趣，希望於夏季得到他的加盟，再度輔助C朗。《天空體育》報導，斑馬兵團想重施去年簽得C朗的故技，先與球員經理人取得共識，然後在下一轉會窗施壓促成伊斯高的交易。

不過，RAI指車路士也會加入爭逐，尤其是如果夏薩特在季尾離隊的話，沙利首選是以現年26歲的伊斯高作為代替品。

西媒指皇馬將於今夏正式報價求購夏薩特，屆時他在車路士的合約進入最後一年，佩雷斯希望能以一億歐元或以下達成交易。

如果夏薩特轉投皇馬，車路士就有籌碼與他們討論伊斯高的前途，更可能把正式買斷高華錫（Mateo Kovacic）的交易加入其中，比祖雲達斯更有談判本錢。

Hazard = Isco + Kovacic

RAI 報導指伊斯高與皇馬之間的關係正深陷低谷，有意告別班拿貝球場。皇馬新帥蘇拿利在上任後把伊斯高貶入後備席，據說是得到皇馬主席佩雷斯首肯。

祖雲達斯對伊斯高一直感到興趣，希望於夏季得到他的加盟，再度輔助C朗。《天空體育》報導，斑馬兵團想重施去年簽得C朗的故技，先與球員經理人取得共識，然後在下一轉會窗施壓促成伊斯高的交易。

不過，RAI指車路士也會加入爭逐，尤其是如果夏薩特在季尾離隊的話，沙利首選是以現年26歲的伊斯高作為代替品。

西媒指皇馬將於今夏正式報價求購夏薩特，屆時他在車路士的合約進入最後一年，佩雷斯希望能以一億歐元或以下達成交易。

如果夏薩特轉投皇馬，車路士就有籌碼與他們討論伊斯高的前途，更可能把正式買斷高華錫（Mateo Kovacic）的交易加入其中，比祖雲達斯更有談判本錢。

Hazard = Isco + Kovacic

又學嘢 今次講 regista

https://twitter.com/AKINTESEGUN/status/1087307010918567936

The footballing world appreciate the goal scores, tacklers, dribblers, goal keepers and the likes. But have we come to understand that not everyone can fall into this category but are still important in the success of their respective teams.

The word regista in Italian means "director".In football,this is someone who is involved in every action from the ball into the midfield and a bit going forward.A regista sits in front of the back 4, get the ball and try locate MF/Forward players from deep in difficult situations.

One of the finest Regista of our generation is Andre Pirlo. He doesn't really get involved in goal scoring or assist but his influence in the team in relation to absorbing pressure from opponents, passing btw the lines and finding forward players from deep cannot be ignored.

Another example is Sergio Busquets nicknamed Octopus of Badia is vital in Barcelona's possession play and build up. A quote say "if u watch the game u would not see Busquets, Watch Busquets and u would see the game".

Busquets with his eye needle passes and his intelligent off the ball movement is vital in Barcelona's possession play. He doesn't have so much to offer in terms of tackles, goals and assist but a very integral piece in the dynamic play.

Others registas worth mentioning includes Jorginho, William Calvarho, Julian Weigl and Marco Verrati. All are similar in terms of their contributions to their respective teams.

Back to Jorginho, Ferdinand lashed at him that he has no contribution when it comes to goals, assists and tackles.

I am not surprised that an English manager hasn't won the league in the last 20 yrs. Jorginho's contribution in Chelsea's defensive third is vital in the sarriball system of total football. Let's take a look at Jorginho's stats for the season.

Ball Touches - 2312 1st in the EPL
Passes - 2077 1st in the EPL
Through balls - 16 2nd in the EPL behind David Luiz
Forward passes - 428 1st in the EPL Pass accuracy - 85.3 % 1st
Chances created from opened play - 0.87 per game 1st
Defensive third passes 318 1st
Forward passes in the middle third- 299 1st in the EPL
Defensive third passes 92 1st in the EPL.

People has called for Kante to be used as a Regista in place of Jorginho. When faced with high pressing teams like Tottenham, City, Liverpool and the likes, Kante would bulge under pressure.

The ability of Jorginho to read the game from deep makes him the best option for a team that plays from the back without doubt.
While at Napoli, Allan and hamsik could compliment him with their tackles, passes and work rate which made them a perfect trio.

Kante effectiveness in the Sarriball system is quite minimal with his strength majorly on tackles and interceptions and little on possession, Kovacic and Barkley has been super inconsistent and offers the team little. Sarriball's team is work in progress, he has accumulated more points than Pep at this stage in Pep's first season at City. If Parades (as a third man in the MF with kante and jorginho) and a striker (Maybe Higuain) joins in, the team performance as a whole would be greatly improved.

Sarri talked about the mentality of the players and he's absolutely right when he talks about the mentality. How can he not question players' mentality when Chelsea's best player has been publicly stating that he wants to join his 'dream club' Real Madrid. How are the players really going to fight for this club when they've set their eyes on other clubs. I'm not saying that Hazard and Hudson Odoi are wrong. And at the same time, I also don't think that Sarri is wrong to question players' mentality.
Hazard and Hudson Odoi want to leave, please leave. The club existed before these two and the club will exist after these two. May be it's time for Chelsea to now finally rebuild this team. replies.msg:
夏薩特近年來，在車路士表現驚豔，他是藍軍如今的招牌球星。在接受採訪時，夏薩特回憶了和摩連奴、干地等教練的合作，他直言自己讓這些主教練失望了。

　　上週末，車路士0-2輸給了阿仙奴，這讓教練沙利遭到了不少質疑。夏薩特對此表示：「我不僅僅讓干地失望過，我讓所有的主教練都感到失望過，現在我讓沙利失望了。之前我也讓摩連奴失望了，他們都希望我能夠攻入更多球，有更多的表現。下一任主教練，我可能也會讓他沮喪。」

　　隨後夏薩特談及了人們把他和美斯C.朗拿度比較的話題，夏薩特表示：「人們將足球和勝利聯繫在一起，對於年輕球員而言，他們必須贏、贏、贏，而球員們因此忘記了享受比賽，我就不一樣了，我總是很高興。讓我困惑的是，球員被評進前三或者前四，是因為他們贏的獎盃數和個人統計數據。這不是我追求的。我只想在球場上享受自己，我踢開心了，哪怕被評前5、前10、前20，我都無所謂。」

　　「如果一個人他只考慮球員的統計數據，那他評的頂級球員名單里就不會有我。但他如果考慮的是享受比賽這個過程，我將進入前三名。我取得的成就非常棒，當我回看自己的職業生涯時，我也認為這很棒。我唯一缺少的就是統計數據。」

　　「如果我今季最終斬獲30球20助攻，那麼即使我踢出了一些很糟糕的比賽，那人們也會說，沒事，他是特別的。但這種情況可不是我想要的。」在夏薩特看來，他的水平已經是球壇前三的水準，可惜人們只考慮統計數據和榮譽，這影響了他的真實排名。

下一任主教練
即係一係佢走，一係沙走

　　「如果一個人他只考慮球員的統計數據，那他評的頂級球員名單里就不會有我。但他如果考慮的是享受比賽這個過程，我將進入前三名。我取得的成就非常棒，當我回看自己的職業生涯時，我也認為這很棒。我唯一缺少的就是統計數據。」

　　「如果我今季最終斬獲30球20助攻，那麼即使我踢出了一些很糟糕的比賽，那人們也會說，沒事，他是特別的。但這種情況可不是我想要的。」在夏薩特看來，他的水平已經是球壇前三的水準，可惜人們只考慮統計數據和榮譽，這影響了他的真實排名。

下一任主教練

今晚完場沙蛇又屌班球員冇鬥心

車路士近期戰績低落，上輪英超吞阿仙奴兩蛋，近十一場聯賽輸咗四場，雖然仲排緊聯賽第四，但僅領先阿仙奴同曼聯三分，再唔振作幾難搶到下屆歐聯席位。領隊沙利大發雷霆，公開力數球員唔識踢大戰，毫無「戰士」應有氣質。

但英媒報道，車仔戰績曳沙利責無旁貸。呢名意大利領隊，操練方法毫不合理，言論又導致球隊士氣低落。首先佢於操練時，不時將防守球員及中前場球員分開，即係守將齋練防守、中前場只練進攻，故球隊落場時，防守球員同中前場未能連接，出現斷開兩截情況。

另外當球隊於聯賽踢夜波時，沙利竟要求球隊於比賽日練波，早前英聯盃四強首回合對熱刺時，艾華路莫拉達就於賽日操練時受傷未能落場。球員認為呢個安排毫無必要，唔單只增加受傷機會，而且於比賽時好快冇氣。

第三係沙利向球員表明，只會選擇部份球員踢英超賽事，導致一啲邊緣球員冇晒心機，有球員甚至講笑話，沙利甚至唔知自己叫咩名。以上總總令車仔陣營士氣低沉，睇嚟沙利極需要改變帶隊風格。

Collins reveals what Guardiola said to him after Chelsea loanee conceded NINE goals against Man City

"He said; 'tough night?' I simply said 'yes'. Then he proceeded to say what an incredible achievement it was for us to get to the semi-final," Collins told Goal, as he revealed Guardiola's kind words upon a heavy defeat. "He said that we were a credit to ourselves and he said the same to the staff.
